title: Understanding Nested IF Functions
text: A nested IF function is a formula that contains multiple IF functions within each other. This allows for more complex decision-making processes.

title: Structure of Nested IF Functions
text: In a nested IF function, the result of one IF function can be another IF function, allowing for multiple conditions to be evaluated in sequence.

hintAnswer: A decision tree where one IF function lies in another
title: Identifying Nested IF Functions
text: Which of the following best describes a nested IF function?
choices: A decision tree where one IF function lies in another
decision tree where two IF functions exist but only one is used
